sentences: SBSTA Chair Wojtal recalled that two workshops on this agenda item will be held at this meeting.
Informal consultations will be co-facilitated by Emmanuel Dumisani Dlamini (Swaziland) and Peter Iversen (Denmark).
ARGENTINA asked for clarifications on the scope of these consultations.
SBSTA Chair Wojtal explained they would not prejudice the reporting on this item at SBSTA 43.
